articles.content: After returning to our screens last year, 17 years after it was last seen, Changing Rooms is back. Much to our delight, the home makeover show starts tonight with Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen at the helm.… [+3195 chars]

articles.title: The Sandman: Neil Gaiman shares message for ‘hostile’ fans regarding new Netflix series - The Independent

articles.content:
Neil Gaiman has issued a message to hostile fans of The Sandman as the Netflix adaptation is released.
An adaptation of Gaimans beloved DC Comics series has been in the works for many years, and the… [+1931 chars]

articles.title: Ryan Reynolds reveals how wife Blake Lively reacted to him buying Wrexham FC - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ryan Reynolds said he remembered when he told wife Blake Lively about how he bought part of a Welsh football team on Tuesday night's Jimmy Kimmel Live! On ABC.
articles.content:
Ryan Reynolds has revealed his wife Blake Lively was not happy when he told her the he had bought Welsh football team Wrexham FC with actor Rob McElhenney.

articles.title: Darryl Hunt: The Pogues 'saddened' as bass player dies - BBC
articles.description: The Pogues' frontman Shane MacGowan says they will all miss the "really nice" bass player.
articles.content:
The Pogues have paid tribute to their "great friend" and bandmate, bass player Darryl Hunt who has died age 72.
